original_text: They are winning one battle after another! They are destroying the whole land. Our homes are becoming heaps of stones. They quickly knock down our tents. They are winning one battle after another! They are destroying the whole land. Our homes are becoming heaps of stones. They quickly knock down our tents. They are winning one battle after another!
korean_text: 패망에 패망이 연속하여 온 땅이 탈취를 당하니 나의 장막과 휘장은 갑자기 파멸되도다

sentences.original_text: They are winning one battle after another!
They are destroying the whole land.
Our homes are becoming heaps of stones.
They quickly knock down our tents.
